radiographic_examinations.findings: Hepatic steatosis, extensive cavernous transformation of the portal vein, splenomegaly measuring up to 14.5 cm, trace fluid in the pelvis, and a small fat containing umbilical hernia. No evidence of focal lesions or biliary dilatation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Diffuse heterogeneous enhancement is overall similar compared to the previous MRI, likely related to variable perfusion in the setting of cavernous transformation of the portal vein.
